mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.type_name AS "typeName", a.seller_id AS "sellerId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select: select id as "id", type_name as "typeName" from family where seller_id=#{0}

SELECT
FROM family a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.type_name LIKE '%'||#{typeName}||'%' '%'+#{typeName}+'%' concat('%',#{typeName},'%')
AND a.seller_id LIKE '%'||#{sellerId}||'%' '%'+#{sellerId}+'%' concat('%',#{sellerId},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO family( id, type_name, seller_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{typeName}, #{sellerId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE family SET type_name = #{typeName}, seller_id = #{sellerId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
